bibl.title: P.Duk. inv. 727r: New Evidence for the Meaning and Provenance of the Word Προσήλυτος.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Views on προσήλυτος in the nineteenth century. - 3. The shift of προσήλυτος from ""sojourner"" to ""proselyte"". - 4. Assessing the debate. - 5. P.Duk. inv. 727r [edd.: C. Jacob Butera & David M. Moffit, P. Duk. inv. 727: A Dispute with ""Proselytes"" in Egypt, ZPE 177 (2011) pp. 201-206, 2 figg.]. - 6. Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: David M. Moffit & C. Jacob Butera, P.Duk. inv. 727r: New Evidence for the Meaning and Provenance of the Word Προσήλυτος.

1. Introduction. - 2. Views on προσήλυτος in the nineteenth century. - 3. The shift of προσήλυτος from ""sojourner"" to ""proselyte"". - 4. Assessing the debate. - 5. P.Duk. inv. 727r [edd.: C. Jacob Butera & David M. Moffit, P. Duk. inv. 727: A Dispute with ""Proselytes"" in Egypt, ZPE 177 (2011) pp. 201-206, 2 figg.]. - 6. Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
